services.name: Swedish Massage
services.description: A timeless, soothing massage designed to melt away tension and promote deep relaxation. Gentle, flowing strokes enhance circulation, calm the nervous system, and restore the body's natural balanceâ€”leaving you refreshed, renewed, and radiating peace.

services.name: Deep Cleansing Facial
services.description: Purity & Balance Renewal, A refreshing, purifying treatment designed to restore balance to tired, congested, or stressed skin.

services.name: Microdermabrasion
services.description: Diamond Radiance Facial, Experience gentle resurfacing that polishes away dead skin cells using fine crystals or a diamond tip. This therapy refines texture, reduces fine lines, and enhances natural luminosity. Beyond beauty, it's a mindful moment of self-renewal ,helping you shed not only surface dullness but also the weight of daily stress.

services.name: Micro needling
services.description: Cellular Rejuvenation Therapy, a transformative treatment that stimulates collagen production and skin healing through micro-needling technology. This rejuvenation ritual restores firmness, refines pores, and softens scars while fostering inner balance. It's a mindful journey of renewal ,as your skin regenerates, so does your sense of self.

services.name: WART Removal
services.description: Professional wart removal treatment using safe and effective techniques. Our skilled therapists provide gentle, targeted removal to restore smooth, healthy skin with minimal discomfort.
